algraph

Class Graph

  • java.lang.Object
    • algraph.Graph
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    class Graph
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Graph class containing a vector of Nodes. Can be serialized.

        public Queue<java.lang.Integer> getAdj(int node)
        Get nodes adjacent to a given one.

      • getWeight

        public int getWeight(int from,
                     int to)
        Get weight of a specific edge. This assumes the given edge exists.

      • addNode

        public void addNode()
        Add a new node.

      • removeNode

        public boolean removeNode(int id)
        Remove the given node if exists. If it doesn't it returns false. This also removes all the edges starting from / ending on the removed node.

      • addEdge

        public boolean addEdge(int from,
                       int to,
                       int weightStart,
                       int weightEnd)
        Creates an edge with a random weight(from the given range) if possible. if one of the given nodes(starting/ending) doesn't exist or the specific edge already exists, returns false.

      • addEdge

        public boolean addEdge(int from,
                       int to,
                       int w)
        Creates an edge with the given weight if possible. if one of the given nodes(starting/ending) doesn't exist or the specific edge already exists, returns false.

      • removeEdge

        public boolean removeEdge(int from,
                          int to)

      • editEdge

        public boolean editEdge(int from,
                        int to,
                        int newWeight)
        Edit an edge's weight if possible. If not, return false.

      • updateEdgesTo

        public void updateEdgesTo(int to,
                          int x,
                          int y)
        Update line positioning for edges ending in the given node.

      • edgeExists

        public boolean edgeExists(int from,
                          int to)
        Returns true if the given edge already exists.

      • updateEdges

        public void updateEdges()
        Update line positioning for all the existing edges.

      • generateGUI

        public void generateGUI()
        Generate GUI from the internal data. Suitable for serialization.

      • setColor

        public void setColor(int node,
                     javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
        Set fill color of the given node(circle).
